attributes.action: hold three referenda for the independence of Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom is a controversial entity which must either be dissolved or confirmed through a process of self determination. Each country deserves the right to dictate their own fate and future.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=+referendum
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
